price: 22. (sakydami): „Eikite anksti prie savo derliaus, jei norite kirsti vaisius.“
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
